price: (2) Do the people think that they will be left to say, "We believe" and they will not be tried?
arabic: أَحَسِبَ ٱلنَّاسُ أَن يُتۡرَكُوٓاْ أَن يَقُولُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَهُمۡ لَا يُفۡتَنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: aḥasiba al-nāsu an yut'rakū an yaqūlū āmannā wahum lā yuf'tanūna
